***
dco
***

.. program-output:: lftools-uv dco --help

Commands
========



check
---------

.. program-output:: lftools-uv dco check --help
                    List of git commit hash missing the DCO (Signed-off-by line).


.. note::

    Check for exit status to determine if the DCO check passed.
